transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Yes.
Executive: Haanji madam, main Lucknow se baat kar raha hun.
Customer: Haan bolo.
Executive: Haan aapne madam call karne ke liye bola tha aur aapne call bhi kiya tha, bataiye madam.
Customer: Maine call kiya tha.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Wahi concern hai jo maine pehle bataya tha, same cheezein hain.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Aapne kuch uska solution diya hi nahi mujhe. Aap aap ye dekh lo na, ek kaam karo, aap free minutes lead show karte dekh lo, meri seven leads next hone wali hain but ek bhi inquiry aa nahi rahi hai. Batao main kaise pick karu, kaise baat karu, first thing. Second kya hai, aapne Delhi ko block kiya hua tha. Abhi bas mujhe Delhi ki hi leads dikhai de rahi hain. Iske alawa kahin ki leads nahi dikha rahi hai. Jo hamari high priority thi, wahan ki to koi leads hi nahi aa rahi hai mere paas.
Executive: Achha.
Customer: Batao main kya karu ab?
Executive: Delhi aapne block karwaya tha.
Customer: Aapne hi karaya tha bhai.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Aapne hi karaya tha mujhe Google Meet pe jaake, preference not preference mein dalala tha. Agar aapko yaad ho to.
Executive: Ek ek second main check kar lu.

Executive: Nahi not preferred location pe nahi dala tha, wo Delhi ke aapne ek not relevant mark kiya hoga, hai na?
Customer: Nahi, nahi, nahi.
Customer: Mujhe achhe se yaad hai Google Meet pe leke tumne sari cheezein wahan se kiya tha.
Executive: To isme show nahi kar raha hai. Not preferred location mein wo add hai. Ek baar add ho jaate to wo add hi rehta hai jab tak hum khud remove na karein tab tak wo remove hota nahi hai.
Customer: Pata hai, pata nahi but aap wahan pe dal do usko. Delhi ko to mujhe chahiye nahi, maine bataya tha hamara main focus Purvanchal hai to Purvanchal pe hi rakho aap please. Wahan ki leads ek bhi nahi dikh rahi hai, aap pura mera history nikal ke dekh sakte ho pura.
Executive: Madam mere paas history access hai nahi ki main koi location aapki wo kar saku, wo aap hi kar sakte ho.
Customer: Hmm. Aap chaho to main aap sham ko, main sham ko kar leti hun aaj.
Executive: Haan wo baki main aapka consumption dekh raha hun madam, jaise aaj bhi dekho Lucknow ke liye mili hui hai, aapko mil to rahi hai matlab us side ki problem chal rahi hai.
Customer: Kahan mili hai? Kitne dino baad to aaj ek mili hai. Aap soch lo aap aap mujhe 12 lead de rahe ho jisme se saat lead abhi consume bhi nahi hua hai aur aise aise lead consume hue hain jo 10 10 30 15 aise humne consume kiya hai.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Kyunki agar consume nahi karenge to us pe dikhayega nahi ki hum work kar rahe hain, work nahi karenge to fir wahan pe leads nahi aana start hoga. To batao dikhna to chahiye, fir agar main do teen ka hi uthane lagungi to fir aap do teen hi doge. 1000 2000 3000 rupees doge hi nahi fir.
Executive: Nahi madam aisa nahi hota, sari leads aapko show karte hain.
Customer: Aisa hi hota hai bhai. Jo aap consume karte ho wahi leads aapko preference mein jaake utni quantity bhi hamesha show karti hai.
Executive: Madam dekhiye ek maine pehle bhi bataya tha ki ek limited area mein deal karoge to jitni leads generate hogi.
Customer: Limited bhai limited area kahan hai? UP chhota hai kya? Bihar chhota hai kya? Do state cover kar rahe hain aur do state agar hum cover kar le ja to bahut badi baat hoti hai.
Executive: Do state se bhi aap Purvanchal ek next kar rahe ho, maximum Purvanchal ka hona chahiye.
Customer: Purvanchal UP Bihar aur UP dono Purvanchal mein hi aata hai. South mein nahi aata hai. Dono to usi mein aata hai na.
Executive: Achha UP to bahut bada ho gaya na, UP ka to ye Noida Noida to side area UP ka hi hai.
Customer: Haan to yahan ki bhi to nahi dikh rahi hai na fir. Main yahan dikhaya aapne? Yahan ki bhi nahi dikh rahi hai.
Executive: Yahan ki madam aapne wahan ka apna preferred location ka ek pattern bana liya hai, theek hai? To aapko suggest wahin se karega to.
Customer: Haan to wahi baat hai wahan ka bhi to suggest nahi kar raha hai na main wahi aapko bata rahi hun. Wahan ka bhi suggest nahi kar raha hai mujhe.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Aap last last 15 days ka aap utha ke dekh lo ki kitni Banaras ki mujhe lead aayi, kitni Lucknow ki lead aayi, kitni Gorakhpur ki lead aayi, kitni Basti ki lead aayi aap utha ke dekh lo sari cheezein. Aapko to dikh raha hoga pura graph.
Executive: Madam ek category mein nahi mil rahi to aap dusre category se aayiye. Aapne street light pole add kar rakhe hain, yahan isme kuch lead aa rahi hain. Isme aap check kariye dekhiye abhi Bihar ki lead hui hai 1 lakh rupees ki lead 10 piece ki lead hui hai.
Customer: Wo wo direct direct inquiry aayi hai, buylead nahi aayi hai. Hamara hot product maine aapko din manager se baat kiya tha teen din do din pehle, Abdul karke the. Unhone maine bataya ki hamara jo hot product hai wo wo dustbin ka hi hai, theek hai? Poles bhi hai lekin wo secondary hai. Hot hai hamara jo dustbin hai to wahan ki to bilkul nahi dikh rahi hai.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Unhone hamari kuch category add bhi kiye fir bhi kuch nahi dikh raha hai.
Executive: Dekho ek iski vegetable crate ki hai Bihar ki lead hai shop ki lead hai.
Customer: Nahi, nahi chahiye maine unko bataya isko hata do aap. Maine bola unse nahi chahiye ye.
Executive: Kis cheez ko, kis cheez ko?
Customer: Crate ko.
Executive: Plastic crate karao plastic crate.
Customer: Plastic carrot hi bolte hain usko.
Executive: Achha carrot.
Customer: Haan to aap usko hata do. Plates to hum karte hi nahi hai agar plates ka de rahe ho to hum plates to category add hi nahi hai fir. Not relevant usko mark kariye aap usko.
Executive: Plates nahi hum aap isme se kaun se nahi kar rahe ho abhi kyunki ye kuch din pehle to aapne us rate karwaye maine sare images wagera aapke usme add kiye the. Aapne ye pallets wale sare add karaye the.
Customer: Pallets nahi carrot tha, pallets nahi tha wo industrial pallets pallets hota hai na, carrots hota hai na.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Plate ki baat karu, carrot ki baat karu, pallets ki baat karu, teeno alag alag cheezein hain aap batao kiski baat kar rahe ho.
Executive: Teeno teeno alag alag hai to main puch raha hun isme se kis mein aap nahi kar rahe ho deal?
Customer: Pallets mein bhi kar rahe hain, carrot mein bhi kar rahe hain lekin ye hamari major products nahi hai, hot product nahi hai. Hamara hot product hai, aisa hai ki haan agar aayegi to deal kar lenge usme deny nahi karenge. Lekin ab aisa nahi hai ki na aap pura carrots ke hi utha ke mujhe de do. Ye to possible nahi hoga na. Maine bataya ek din 50 baar bataya ki mera hot product dustbin hai, dustbin hai, dustbin hai. Mujhe usme aap le aake do bas.
Executive: Haan agar nahi aata hai to main kar main dustbin ki sari category aap utha lena jitna bhi hai.
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Aapke sir ne bhi do din pehle hi sari cheezein add ki hai.
Executive: Madam kuch bhi add karte hain, changes karte hain to usme usko implement hone mein bhi time lag jata hai. Aisa nahi humne aaj add kar diya kal sari cheezein theek ho jayengi. Aap ab category add hui hai usme matching karke aapko list wagera send karne mein time lagega.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Hmm. To.
Customer: Chalo theek hai koi nahi aap bas ek do din aur wait kar leti hun, theek hai? Fir main baat karti hun aapse.
Executive: Baki isko update karane ka kya plan kar rahe hain? Aapne bola tha November mein karaoge aap?
Customer: Arre yaar kya baat kar rahe ho, leads to aayi nahi 20 25 din 30 din se. Main kis base pe upgrade karaun? Pata chala main paise de du aur fir arre aap panel utha ke dekho na fir.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Maine to bola tha maine maine bola to tha aapko upgrade karne ke liye maine khud se bola tha kyunki mujhe bahut achhi inquiry aa rahi thi. Theek hai direct inquiry bhi aa rahi hai ab na hi direct inquiry aa rahi hai na buyleads aa rahi hai to kis base pe matlab upgrade kar le?
Executive: Achha us samay to aa rahi thi us samay bhi to aapne nahi karaya. Wo to kabhi na kabhi aisa rehta hai na kabhi inquiry achhi aati hai kabhi inquiry kharab aati hai.
Customer: Arre theek hai to main ek baar dekh aap mujhe thoda time do main check kar leti hun agar beech mein mere paas inquiry achhi ka flow hota hai to main December tak karwa lungi chalo ek mahine ka time do mujhe aap fir.
Executive: Aap alag alag keyword search karke kariye madam, theek hai agar jaise dustbin ka wahan nahi mil raha hai to aap dustbin search karo, theek hai usme apna jo dustbin ka alag keyword aap dal sakte ho. Agar Neelkamal dustbin mein karte to wo dal ke dekhiye plastic dustbin to kahin na kahin kuch na kuch keyword match ho gaya aapko kyunki aapne alag alag categories mein add kar diye hain aapne poles mein bhi add kar diye hain to har tarah ki list suggest karega wahan pe aapko lekin agar aapko specific kisi product line mein zyada inquiries chahiye na to wo aapko search karna hi padega upar jaake.
Customer: Hai na?
Customer: Theek hai. Chalo theek hai main baat karti hun aapse, theek hai? Aap ek baar dekh lo leads ka jo bhi hai na.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai madam main ab lead close kar du main aapka?
Customer: Nahi, pehle meri inquiry sahi karwao please.
Executive: Madam inquiries ke liye main rahunga main aap mujhe call kar sakte ho anytime main aapko help kar sakta hun.
Customer: Ek ek ek do din aur dekho aap meri inquiry sahi karao main close karwa deti hun isko aap please.
Executive: Last maine aapse kaha tha ki aap mujhse kar lijiyega maine call kiya bhi tha aapko.
Customer: Maine kiya maine bhi aapko call kiya tha maine do baar call kiya tha main screen shot aapko bhej sakti hun aap busy ja rahe the.
Executive: Hmm to us samay ho sakta hai kuch kaam ho.
Customer: Thoda response karna chahiye tha na. Aapne response nahi kiya isliye maine wahan pe message kiya.
Executive: Madam aapne jaise jaise aapne message kiya tha call me to maine aapko call bhi kiya tha us turant message dekh ke.
Customer: Chalo ek meri important call aa rahi hai main baat karti hun to.
Executive: Madam bataiye already chaar din ho chuke hain is ticket ko.
Customer: Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain, unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahein. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain, unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahein.
summary:
Concerns:

- Leads not showing as per preferred location.

- Wants leads from Purvanchal region.

- Inquiries are not as per hot product (dustbin).



Resolution:

- Executive checked and said Delhi was not blocked.

- Suggested searching with different keywords.

- Executive assured assistance with inquiries.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will wait for a day or two.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- leads, location, purvanchal, dustbin, inquiry
